## Nina

Smoking status in column 'Smokes': Change 1.0 and 0.0 to yes and no.

```{r}
data <- data %>%
  mutate(Smokes = case_when(
    Smokes == "0.0" ~ "no",
    Smokes == "1.0" ~ "yes"
  ))
```
